00023 #ifndef Eval_Dift_VDF_var_included
00024 #define Eval_Dift_VDF_var_included
00025 
00026 #include <Eval_Diff_VDF_var.h>
00027 #include <Eval_Turbulence.h>
00028 #include <Ref_Champ_Fonc.h>
00029 #include <Champ_Fonc.h>
00030 
00031 // 
00032 //
00033 //
00034 //
00035 //
00036 //! class Eval_Dift_VDF_var<br>Cette classe represente un evaluateur de flux diffusif<br>total (diffusion laminaire et turbulente)<br>avec une diffusivite variable en espace.
00037 
00038 // .SECTION
00039 // voir aussi Eval_Diff_VDF_var
00040 
00041 class Eval_Dift_VDF_var : public Eval_Diff_VDF_var, public Eval_Turbulence
00042 {
00043 public:
00044   inline void associer_diff_turb(const Champ_Fonc& diff_turb)
00045   {
00046     diffusivite_turbulente_=diff_turb;
00047     dv_diffusivite_turbulente.ref(diff_turb.valeurs());
00048   }
00049 
00050   inline const Champ_Fonc& diffusivite_turbulente() const
00051   {
00052     return diffusivite_turbulente_.valeur();
00053   }
00054 
00055 // Overloaded methods used by the flux computation in template class:
00056   inline double nu_1_impl(int i, int compo) const
00057   {
00058     const double nu_lam = Eval_Diff_VDF_var::nu_1_impl(i,compo);
00059     const double nu_turb = dv_diffusivite_turbulente(i);
00060     return nu_lam+nu_turb;
00061   }
00062 
00063   inline double nu_2_impl(int i, int compo) const
00064   {
00065     return  Eval_Diff_VDF_var::nu_2_impl(i,compo);
00066   }
00067 
00068   inline double nu_1_impl_face(int i, int j, int compo) const
00069   {
00070     return 0.5*(dv_diffusivite_turbulente(i)+dv_diffusivite_turbulente(j));
00071   }
00072 
00073   inline double nu_2_impl_face(int i, int j, int k, int l, int compo) const
00074   {
00075     return 0.25*(dv_diffusivite_turbulente(i)+dv_diffusivite_turbulente(j)+
00076                  dv_diffusivite_turbulente(k)+dv_diffusivite_turbulente(l));
00077   }
00078 
00079   inline double nu_lam_impl_face(int i, int j, int k, int l, int compo) const
00080   {
00081     return Eval_Diff_VDF_var::nu_2_impl_face(i,j,k,l,compo);
00082   }
00083 
00084   inline double nu_lam_impl_face2(int i, int j, int compo) const
00085   {
00086     return Eval_Diff_VDF_var::nu_1_impl_face(i,j,compo);
00087   }
00088 
00089   inline double nu_t_impl(int i, int compo) const
00090   {
00091     return dv_diffusivite_turbulente(i);
00092   }
00093 
00094   inline double compute_heq_impl(double d0, int i, double d1, int j, int compo) const
00095   {
00096     const double heq_lam = Eval_Diff_VDF_var::compute_heq_impl(d0, i, d1, j, compo);
00097     const double heq_turb= 0.5*(dv_diffusivite_turbulente(i)+dv_diffusivite_turbulente(j))/(d1+d0);
00098     return heq_lam + heq_turb;
00099   }
00100 
00101   inline virtual double get_equivalent_distance(int boundary_index,int local_face) const
00102   {
00103     return equivalent_distance[boundary_index](local_face);
00104   }
00105 
00106   inline void mettre_a_jour()
00107   {
00108     Eval_Diff_VDF_var::mettre_a_jour();
00109     update_equivalent_distance();  //!< from Eval_Turbulence
00110   }
00111 
00112 protected:
00113   REF(Champ_Fonc) diffusivite_turbulente_;
00114   DoubleVect dv_diffusivite_turbulente;
00115 };
00116 
00117 #endif /* Eval_Dift_VDF_var_included */
